Package app.controller.oauth.util.request

Class Request

java.lang.Object
app.controller.oauth.util.request.Request
Direct Known Subclasses:
GetRequest, PostRequest
public abstract class Request
extends java.lang.Object
Base class for an output request.

Uses HttpUrlConnection for sending request.

    • send

      public final java.lang.String send() throws ApiException
      Executes the request.

      Parses url, body. Sends the request. Returns answer.

      Returns:
      answer to the request
      Throws:
      ApiException - if request wasn't success

      Returns:

      java.io.IOException - if if input output error while reading occurs
